caption.p: (A) Cyclic voltammograms of anC:Np5, anC:Np10, and anC:Np20 electrodes in Ar-saturated 0.1 M TBAPF 6 in acetonitrile at 50 mV s −1; the CV of the nitrogen-free anC material is also shown for comparison. Impedance modulus (B) and phase (C) obtained from EIS data (Bode plots) in the same solution at open circuit potential (OCP −0.28–0.1 V vs. Ag/Ag +) are also shown for the electrode materials.
